title: Plot dose response curve
text: Use geom_4PL() ggplot. plot dose response curve . EC50 values plotted upper right corner.  Within panel, different group (color/fill) treated separately.  geom_4PL() ignore transformation made x axis, scale_x_log10().  geom_4PL() plot individual data point used dose response relation. Use conjunction geom achieve desired look.

title: 4-parameter logistic regression (4PL) — stat_4PL
text: stat fit 4PL line using drc::drm(). x data used transformed. word, fitted model influenced scale_x_() functions. stat layer implement regression model, geom layer inherits geom_line make plot.

title: 4-parameter logistic regression (4PL) — stat_4PL
code: stat_4PL(   geom = GeomLine,   position = position_identity(),   fct = drc::LL.4(names = c("Slope", "Lower Limit", "Upper Limit", "EC50")),   ... )  geom_4PL(   geom = Geom4PL,   stat = Stat4PL,   position = position_identity(),   fct = drc::LL.4(names = c("Slope", "Lower Limit", "Upper Limit", "EC50")) )
